message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,200,000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $1,200,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to pay up to $800,000.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1,100,000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm willing to negotiate further if needed.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,100,000 is still a stretch for me. I'm committed to finding a deal that works for both of us, so I'm offering $900,000. This is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still not willing to go below $1,000,000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and offer the product for $1,050,000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, we're getting closer, but $1,050,000 is still outside of my comfort zone.  I'm willing to go up to $950,000.  Let's meet in the middle and close this deal.

Bob, I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still not willing to go below $1,000,000. I'm willing to make another slight concession and offer the product for $1,025,000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, I really want to make this deal work, but I'm simply unable to go above $975,000. This is my final offer.  If we can't agree, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I understand your final offer, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $1,000,000. I'm willing to make one last concession and offer the product for $1,025,000. This is the best price I can offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
